wikipedia_page.main: Allan Gray (born 12 December 1943) was a Scottish amateur football centre half who played in the Scottish League for Clyde and Queen's Park. He was capped by Scotland at amateur level.

response: Allan Gray is a name that may refer to:
* Allan Gray (investment management company), a South African-based investment management firm
* Allan Gray (investor) (1938–2019), South African investor and founder of Allan Gray Investment Management and the Allan and Gill Gray Foundation
